title: Nidalee Scripter please ban in Platinum (Riot Please Open)
body:
Nidalee in our game, was scripting, dodging all possible movement as soon as cast. 
We have footage and the players ign, we will reveal all neccasary details if need be. My ign is Grimzz and he was in my previous ranked game.
My mate has footage of his actions such and flash blind q's over walls and dodging a lucian q olaf q charm and q under 2 seconds.
im not whining, i just want this player banned as she was also being toxic throughout the game.
ALL 5 player on our team reported the player for cheating
Riot please responf- Thanks from Grimzz :)

replies.body:
Hey there,

This board is for help & support regarding technical issues with the game, not for reporting cheaters.

As you've already submitted an in game report this user is potentially already being looked into.

If you wish to submit a further report with your evidence included you can [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and they will forward the information to the correct team.
